It's very easy to simulate: running the group "d=
b.*" in TestNG will run all
the groups that belong to a group that starts w=
ith "db". Naming your groups
in a hierarchical way similar to packages ("db=
.fast", "db.slow",
"frontend.login", etc...) leads to a very flexible way t=
o structure your
tests.
